publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: In Lǔ there was someone who was entering the city gate with a long pole,

sense.def: there was an N which V-ed

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: In Lǔ there was someone who was entering the city gate with a long pole,

sense.def: holding an N to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: In Lǔ there was someone who was entering the city gate with a long pole,

sense.def: try to enter

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and first he held it upright,

sense.def: for the first time

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and first he held it upright,

sense.def: vertically

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and first he held it upright,

sense.def: hold and carry (any object) with one or with two hands; wield

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but it was impossible to get in;

sense.def: be impossible to enter

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but it was impossible to get in;

sense.def: of persons: go in, enter; join; enter through; of things: enter (also: 入山) [SEPARATE OFF THE FIGURATIVE USAGES AMONG THE EXAMPLES. CH]

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but it was impossible to get in;

sense.def: enter through 入門

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the he held it sidewise,

sense.def: horizontally; crosswise; from the side

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the he held it sidewise,

sense.def: hold and carry (any object) with one or with two hands; wield

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: but it was also impossible to get in.

sense.def: likewise; also; as well (referring to predicate, often with repetition of the verb)

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He was unable to come up with any efficient plan.

sense.def: effective stategy, sound plan

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He was unable to come up with any efficient plan.

sense.def: no object

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He was unable to come up with any efficient plan.

sense.def: in no way 無所成名

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: He was unable to come up with any efficient plan.

sense.def: come to think of, think up, invent

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Suddenly there was an old man who came up

sense.def: all of a sudden, out of the blue

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Suddenly there was an old man who came up

sense.def: turn up

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Suddenly there was an old man who came up

sense.def: old man

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: "I am not a sage,

sense.def: be a sage (not: be THE sage) (tensed)

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the only thing is that the things I have seen in my time are many.

sense.def: have observed N that are ov the V kind 見事多 "have seen many things"

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: the only thing is that the things I have seen in my time are many.

sense.def: modal particle marking new/current situation (like 了)

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why don't you saw over the middle of the pole and take then in separately?"

sense.def: you surely should, why don't you

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why don't you saw over the middle of the pole and take then in separately?"

sense.def: by means of V-ing

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why don't you saw over the middle of the pole and take then in separately?"

sense.def: to use a saw on

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why don't you saw over the middle of the pole and take then in separately?"

sense.def: its middle part, the middle part of the contextually determiate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why don't you saw over the middle of the pole and take then in separately?"

sense.def: cut in two

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why don't you saw over the middle of the pole and take then in separately?"

sense.def: enter the contextually determinate place (typically the capital) [Note that it seems the omission of the resumptive pronominal object is idiomatic. But it is not obligatory as the fair number of 入之 shows.]

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why don't you saw over the middle of the pole and take then in separately?"

sense.def: saw

tls:line.title: Translation of 笑林一卷 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: Why don't you saw over the middle of the pole and take then in separately?"

sense.def: in the middle, in the center
and in the end; and as it happens
accordingly
in accordance with the contextually determinate N> accordingly
